articles.description: Thomas Tuchel believes Chelsea will be taking on one of Europe's elite sides when they visit Anfield on Thursday, despite Liverpool's dreadful recent home form.
articles.title: Liverpool vs Chelsea: Thomas Tuchel says Jurgen Klopp's side still one of Europe's elite despite home slump - Sky Sports

articles.description: The European Space Agency wants to make sure its new astronaut class is more diverse. But it will take redesigned gear to make space accessible to everybody.
articles.title: Can Technology Open Spaceflight to Disabled Astronauts? - WIRED
